abstracts.cdata!:
The First Health Project will help
            expand and improve the delivery of primary health and family
            planning services as well as immunization coverage in Sokoto
            State. It will also strengthen the technical advisory
            capacity of the federal health authorities. At the state
            level, it will include: the construction, equipping, and
            staffing of about 60 health clinics; the upgrading of 120
            dispensaries; the provision of vaccines and equipment for
            the immunization program; and the establishment of an
            adequate training and supervision program. At the federal
            level, it will provide for equipment, technical assistance,
            and training.
